description.value: Sharp-eyed and sure-footed, your presence is a boon to those you guide. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Scout], you grant your party a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls instead of the normal +1. When your group uses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hustle] activity, they can use your Constitution modifier to determine how fast the group can Hustle together, even if it isn't the lowest in the group.
